title: Beef Burgundy
ingredients: ['900g lean stewing steak', '250ml red wine', '4 sprigs fresh parsley', '1 sprig fresh thyme', '1 bay leaf', '4 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, sliced', '1 tablespoon flour', '60ml beef stock', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons butter', '110g bacon, chopped', '12 small onions', '100g button mushrooms, sliced']
